attributes.action: Calling on the Government to fund food banks in each town in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
To reduce citizen poverty in children and adults in the UK midst   adverse economic conditions during Covid 19 and beyond.

Easy to replicate using High Street business premises, immediate and effective help for those in the local communities that most need it

"local care 4 the local community" but on YOUR local high street.
attributes.background:
Assist local High Street  business to set up a food bank on their premises for the donation and collection of tinned / dried foods and personal adult and baby care items. 

"Myhighstreetfoodbank" launched in Surrey in January 2021 and has replica models in Hertfordshire and Leicestershire.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555069.
